name: PHOBOS Project (itch)
description:
Phobos Project is a first-person psychological horror adventure exploring your deepest inner fears. In this experiment you have to find a way out and keep your sanity level up through different hostile environments. Face your dread and try to find the source of the nightmare.

WARNING : If you use the rope and nothing happens at the end of the loading : it's a bug. You'll have to quit to the main menu and reload the game by clicking on "continue". Then, try again, it should work. I'll try to fix this bus as soon as I can ! ;)
